com.ojcoleman.ahni.hyperneat

Class HyperNEATConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jgapcustomised.Configuration
      • com.anji.neat.NeatConfiguration
        • com.ojcoleman.ahni.hyperneat.HyperNEATConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Configurable, java.io.Serializable

    public class HyperNEATConfiguration
extends NeatConfiguration
implements Configurable
    Extension of NEAT configuration with HyperNEAT-specific features added:
    • Forces correct number of inputs and outputs according to the number required for the CPPN in the initial ChromosomeMaterial sample from which an initial population is generated.
    • Adds required hidden nodes to the initial ChromosomeMaterial sample from which an initial population is generated if HyperNEATTranscriber.HYPERNEAT_LEO_LOCALITY is enabled.
    Author:
    Oliver Coleman
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • NUM_RUNS_KEY

        public static final java.lang.String NUM_RUNS_KEY
        The number of evolution runs to perform. If this is more than one then it is highly recommended that random.seed is not set so that a unique seed can be generated for each run,
        See Also:
